# Model

We can create a linear model based on the data selected for the plot. We are creating a linear regression to model response variable `r param$y_val` against predictor variable `r params$y_val`.

```{r}
model <- lm(reformulate(params$x_val, params$y_val), data = params$data)
summary(model)
```
